ripe-ripper
================
A simple Python script that retrieves public subnets via ASN system owners. Providing the script with a AS system owner name returns a list of that owner's subnets, printed to stdout.

```
python ripe-ripper.py facebook
31.13.64.0/24
31.13.70.0/24
31.13.84.0/24
2a03:2880:f021::/48
69.171.239.0/24
2a03:2880:f01b::/48
2a03:2880:4000::/36
2a03:2880:f008::/48
69.171.224.0/20
31.13.85.0/24
31.13.65.0/24
2a03:2880:f015::/48
2a03:2880:f001::/48
2a03:2880:2000::/36
173.252.64.0/19
2a03:2880:f01c::/48
```
